test.doc: To verify user able to purchase item in PGmall 1. User login 2. Search for Vacuum 3. Add 2 vacuum into cart 4. Calculate subtotal price(item+shipment) 5. Verify calculated subtotal matched the displayed subtotal in checkout page

suite.doc: Order Item in PG Mall Webpage 13 March 2021 Atikah Mohd Amin
